name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】SHARPLY Unsheathed. Here I Go! 3Dお披露目配信！これが古代兵器の本気。 #AnyaMelfissa3D [QVxgwstf-Aw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Waiting screen for Anya Melfissa's 3D Showcase with upbeat BGM.
Cinematic PV sequence showing a keris and Anya in various dark settings, transitioning to a sunny city street.
Anya Melfissa performs the song 'Aiu-e' in her 3D room.

subtitles.original:
3D SHOWCASE
JULY 28 (FRI)
20:00~ (WIB) / 22:00~ (JST)
#AnyaMelfissa3D
subtitles.english:
3D SHOWCASE
JULY 28 (FRI)
20:00~ (WIB) / 22:00~ (JST)
#AnyaMelfissa3D

subtitles.original: ア・ア・オ・エ・オ・エ・オ・エ・オ
subtitles.english: A-a-o-e-o-e-o-e-o

subtitles.original: ア・ア・オ・エ・オ・エ・オ・エ・オ
subtitles.english: A-a-o-e-o-e-o-e-o

subtitles.original:
アイウエ
Lyrics ・ Composition: SAKURAmoti / 美波
Arrangement: SAKURAmoti / 真船勝博
subtitles.english:
Aiu-e
Lyrics ・ Composition: SAKURAmoti / Minami
Arrangement: SAKURAmoti / Katsuhiro Mafune

subtitles.original: ねえ その言葉に私にちょっと興味ないの
subtitles.english: Hey, aren't you a little interested in those words of mine?

subtitles.original: ああ そう じゃあいいか
subtitles.english: Ah, I see. Then never mind.

subtitles.original: 私全部全部わかってたいの
subtitles.english: I want to understand everything, every single thing.

subtitles.original: ダメなよう？ そんなこと言われても
subtitles.english: No good? Even if you say that...

subtitles.original: 意味わかんないじゃん
subtitles.english: ...it makes no sense.

subtitles.original: 五感現象 異常上昇
subtitles.english: Sensation phenomenon, abnormal rise.

subtitles.original: どこがいいの？なんてよく聞かれるけどさ
subtitles.english: "What's so good about it?" They ask me often, but...

subtitles.original: わからないでいいよ
subtitles.english: It's fine if you don't understand.

subtitles.original: 愛に溢れて止まらないだけ
subtitles.english: I'm just overflowing with love and can't stop.

subtitles.original: ア・ア・ア・イ・エ・イ
subtitles.english: A-a-a-i-e-i

subtitles.original: つまらない どいつもこいつも
subtitles.english: It's boring, everyone's the same,

subtitles.original: 飽きないの？
subtitles.english: Don't you get tired?

subtitles.original: さあ どうする ダーリン？
subtitles.english: Now, what will you do, Darling?

subtitles.original: おお もう絶対 僕にアイウエちゃってしょうがない
subtitles.english: Ah, geez. You're definitely falling for me, it can't be helped.

subtitles.original: いつもの継ぎ足し足しするのは忍びないけど
subtitles.english: I feel bad about always just adding more to it, but...

subtitles.original: 行ったり
subtitles.english: Going...

subtitles.original: 来たり
subtitles.english: ...and coming back.

subtitles.original: 泣き枯れちゃっても
subtitles.english: If I cry myself dry,

subtitles.original: 困っちゃうし
subtitles.english: I'll be in trouble.

subtitles.original: いつまでたったって堪えらんないからさ
subtitles.english: Because I can't bear it no matter how much time passes.

subtitles.original: 僕は今日も逃げるのさ
subtitles.english: I'm running away again today.

subtitles.original: フラフラ
subtitles.english: Wandering around,

subtitles.original: 危険一髪 あなたは僕の運命の人
subtitles.english: A close call. You're the one for me.

subtitles.original: 許してよ こんなのあんまりじゃーん！
subtitles.english: Forgive me. This is just too much!

subtitles.original: よそう 決めないで
subtitles.english: Stop it. Don't decide,

subtitles.original: 選べないで
subtitles.english: Don't choose.

subtitles.original: 僕は全部全部を愛していたいの
subtitles.english: I want to love everything, every single thing.

subtitles.original: 最低だよ そんなこと言われても
subtitles.english: That's the worst. Even if you say that,

subtitles.original: 別に十々承知
subtitles.english: I'm well aware.

subtitles.original: ラブソングに酔い酔い ほどほど
subtitles.english: Drunk on love songs, in moderation.

subtitles.original: 何がダメなの？なんてよく聞かれるけどさ
subtitles.english: "What's so bad about it?" They ask me often, but...

subtitles.original: 他人事もいいところ
subtitles.english: It's none of my business.

subtitles.original: 愛に当たって砕けて立ち上がるだけ
subtitles.english: Just hitting love head-on and picking myself back up.

subtitles.original: 奇想天外 何を言っているのかな？
subtitles.english: Bizarre. What are you saying?

subtitles.original: 悔しであーらら言葉に言っちゃって
subtitles.english: Regrettably, the words just come out.

subtitles.original: アイノアジ チェリアジ ぜんぶだめね
subtitles.english: The taste of love, the taste of cherry. It's all no good.

subtitles.original: 女の子面倒結構
subtitles.english: Girls are such a bother.

subtitles.original: 百花繚乱 雪吹雪いても 天真爛漫 冷静になれど
subtitles.english: Flowers blooming in profusion, even in a blizzard. Innocent and cheerful, even if I become calm.
